Hillshade.__init__ÔÉÅ

Hillshade.__init__(elevation: float, azimuth: float, resolution: float, radius: int | None = None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Constructor for the Hillshade class.

Parameters:

  • elevation (float) ‚Äì Elevation of the sun (in degrees), 0 is vertical top (zenith).

  • azimuth (float) ‚Äì Azimuth of the sun (in degrees), measured clockwise from north.

  • resolution (float) ‚Äì Resolution of a raster pixel (in meters).

  • radius (int, optional) ‚Äì Maximum distance from the current point (in pixels) to consider for evaluating the hillshade. If None, the radius is calculated based on the data range.
